author.name: Customer | Fresh ideas by you - narellew

description: Narelle from QLD is a big fan of this scrumptious and easy vanilla cake recipe. The not-so-secret ingredient is custard powder - making it extra moist.
name: Vanilla Custard Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, 2 tsp zested (save 1 tsp to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Grease a 10 x 21cm (6cm deep) loaf pan and line base and sides with baking paper.
Place flour, butter, vanilla, sugar, eggs, custard powder and milk in a large bowl. Using an electric beater, beat until well combined.

Pour batter into pan. Bake for 1 hour, loosely covering with foil after 40 minutes, or until a skewer inserted into centre comes out clean. Stand cake in pan for 5 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

To make icing, place cream cheese, icing sugar and zest in a bowl. Using an electric beater, beat until smooth. Spread icing on top of cake, then use a spoon to smooth the surface. Serve cake sprinkled with extra zest.
